%c[default]A leather jacket with Kevlar elements. Traditional outfit of a bandit, and any who follow that tradition have never been known to live for very long in the Zone.

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+15%

%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[default]Typical weak Bandit body armor with chain-mail plates sewn into it for slightly better protection. Almost anyone can make one, but not many would have enough patience to do so... nor would it be worth it...

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+5%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+8%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]BulletProof: %c[255,1,255,1]+8%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electric Shock: %c[255,1,255,1]+5%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[default]Typical Bandit Outfit- a leather jacket with Kevlar Elements. This modification has a gas-mask - as a result, environmental protection is slightly improved. Equipped with this ensemble, you might last more than a single day in the Zone, but not much more...

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+5%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+5%
%c[255,1,255,255]BulletProof: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+5%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electric Shock: %c[255,1,255,1]+5%
%c[default]A typical thick, leather trenchcoat that offers very little in terms of environmental protection. Often the Uniform of choice for thieves, and other sordid individuals found scattered about at all four corners of the Zone...

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+15%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]BulletProof: %c[255,1,255,1]+23%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electric Shock: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[default]Typically meant to be worn as a secondary protective layer over-top of armor... this thick, formidable black, leather overcoat has become the trademark 'look' of the Bandit Masters. its protective characteristics are strong, due to the fact that it has been manufactured from 100% pure Chimera-Hide... a tough, sinewy type of leather that must be broken-in rigourously before it can even be worn for the first time by throwing it repeatedly into the 'Roundabout' anomaly...

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+15%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%

%c[255,1,255,255]Stamina: %c[255,1,255,1]+180
%c[default]Typically meant to be worn as a secondary protective layer over-top of armor... this thick, formidable black, leather overcoat has become the trademark 'look' of the Bandit Masters. its protective characteristics are strong, due to the fact that it has been manufactured from 100% pure Chimera-Hide... a tough, sinewy type of leather that must be broken-in rigourously before it can even be worn for the first time by throwing it repeatedly into the 'Roundabout' anomaly... this variant of the garment has somehow managed to absorb certain 'anomolous qualities", and now possesses some very rare, and 'unique' Health Restoration capabilities when equipped...

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]BulletProof: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electric Shock: %c[255,1,255,1]+5%
%c[default]Provides slightly better protection than the Leather Trenchcoat, and the common Bandit's Jacket... however, it would prove highly insufficient against the Zone's rather severe, and ever-changing conditions...

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]BulletProof: %c[255,1,255,1]+38%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+15%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+15%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electric Shock: %c[255,1,255,1]+20%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]30%
%c[255,1,255,255]Telepathy: %c[255,1,255,1]+5%
%c[255,1,255,255]Load-carrying capacity: %c[255,1,255,1]+80kg
%c[default]Exoskeleton designed by Fraera under the direction of Borov... Similar to other Exoskeleton variants in its unique ability to allow for extra carrying capacity... Does not offer the 'best' protection in the Zone because of the lack of real 'Science' involved in building it (Bandits are not known for their academic achievements), however, it does serve its purpose well in regards to basic protection overall...
Duty PSZ-9D Armor PNV 'Cats Eye' MOD-1
Duty PSZ-9D Armor PNV 'White Night' MOD-1

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Bullet-proof: %c[255,1,255,1]+20%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electroshock: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[default]Manufactured exclusively for the Duty Faction by the KDSRI [Kiev Defensive Scientific Research Institute]... this high-end bodysuit was created for rigorous use throughout the Zone. Comprises a heavy PSZ-12p bulletproof vest, a built-in compensation suit, and a Sphere-12M Helmet. Provides excellent protection from bullets and shrapnel, while also offering good protection from anomalies and radiation. Has remarkably high mobility and can be upgraded so that it rivals the Exoskeleton in terms of protection. Cannot use artefacts...
Duty PSZ-9D-2 Armor PNV 'Cats Eye' MOD-1
Duty PSZ-9D-2 Armor PNV 'White Night' MOD-1

%c[default]Manufactured exclusively for the Duty Faction by the KDSRI [Kiev Defensive Scientific Research Institute]... this high-end bodysuit was created for rigorous use throughout the Zone. Comprises a heavy PSZ-12p bulletproof vest, a built-in compensation suit, and a Sphere-12M Helmet with attached breathing apparatus... Provides excellent protection from bullets and shrapnel, while also offering good protection from anomalies and radiation. Has remarkably high mobility and can be upgraded so that it rivals the Exoskeleton in terms of protection. Cannot use artefacts...

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+70%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Bullet-proof: %c[255,1,255,1]+20%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electroshock: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[default]Duty PSZ-9D Armor with improved protection against bites and cuts... This high-end bodysuit was created for the most rigorous use throughout the Zone. Comprises a heavy PSZ-12p bulletproof vest, a built-in compensation unit, and a Sphere-12M Helmet. Manufactured exclusively for the Duty Faction by the KDSRI [Kiev Defensive Scientific Research Institute]...

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Bullet-proof: %c[255,1,255,1]+20%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+40%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+35%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electroshock: %c[255,1,255,1]+45%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]+45%
%c[default]The PSZ-9MD is a wonderful protective suit for the Zone, popular among Duty Veterans. It combines excellent anomalous protection (thanks to the Curtain helmet with an integrated life support system and an anomaly suppression device) and a high quality PSZ-9D Duty Suit, which grants quality protection from bullets, shrapnel and animal claws... The suit is functionally identical to the SEVA Suit...

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+35%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+40%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+35%
%c[255,1,255,255]Bullet-proof: %c[255,1,255,1]+40%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+20%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electroshock: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Telepathy: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Load-carrying capacity: %c[255,1,255,1]+35kg
%c[default]Modified for use in the Zone by the Duty Faction by the KDSRI [Kiev Defensive Scientific Research Institute]... this particular Exoskeleton is the product of advanced military research, initially meant for use by the Ukrainian Military for hazardous missions into the Zone. Due to the sheer cost of a single unit, however, as well as the numerous technical problems and design flaws, the Exoskeleton never reached mass production, but limited numbers continue to be manufactured in underground factories and make their way into the Zone... A major benefit of the Exoskeleton is its ability to greatly increase their wearers's physical strength, allowing them to carry more equipment...
SSP-99 Ecologist Suit PNV 'Cats Eye' MOD-1
SSP-99 Ecologist Suit PNV 'White Night' MOD-1

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+5%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+20%
%c[255,1,255,255]Bullet-proof: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+45%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+45%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electroshock: %c[255,1,255,1]+45%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]+45%
%c[default]The SSP-99 suit has an integrated air-filtering and air-conditioning system with the main body of the suit made out of materials that are resistant to both heat and electricity, providing near-invulnerability to the Zone's radiation, and anomalous activity. For additional protection, the suit is treated with a special substance obtained from 'Urchin' artefacts. It also includes second generation Night-Vision capabilities. Since this suit was designed primarily to protect the wearer from hazardous and toxic elements, it has very poor protection against firearms and explosives...

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+30%
%c[255,1,255,255]Bullet-proof: %c[255,1,255,1]+20%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+45%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+45%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electroshock: %c[255,1,255,1]+45%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]+45%
%c[default]This suit is a high quality modified SSP-99 suit. It provides increased body protection from bullets and shrapnel, as it was designed for guards working within the Scientific Community. This suit comprises a closed-cycle breathing module and an integrated anomalous field suppression system. Anomaly and radiation protection is equal to that of the SSP-99 suit, making the two unmatched in those terms. This suit provides bullet protection equal to that of the SEVA Suit, but offers better explosion protection and higher durability, and it even weighs less. All of this combined with a second generation night vision device make it one of the very best suits in the Zone...
Army Bullet-Proof Vest PNV 'Cats Eye' MOD-1
Army Bullet-Proof Vest PNV 'White Night' MOD-1

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Bullet-proof: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+5%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electroshock: %c[255,1,255,1]+5%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]+5%
%c[default]a typical Soviet-issue battle dress uniform comprising heavy military boots, and a PSZ-7 (Personal Protection System Model-7) bullet-proof vest. Combined with a backpack, and combat webbing, this Uniform is typical of most Military Grunts enlisted throughout the Zone. Offers standartd protection from bullets, and shrapnel, however very ineffective against radiation, and other anomalies...

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+20%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+20%
%c[255,1,255,255]Bullet-proof: %c[255,1,255,1]+23%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electroshock: %c[255,1,255,1]+15%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[default]The Berill-5M Armor is used by the Russian 'special purpose regiments' or 'Spetsnaz"... Specifically modified for the Zone, it includes a PSZ-9A Military bullet-proof vest with beryllium coating, and a Sphere-08 helmet. It features a European Woodland camouflage pattern. The helmet has a special copper wire mesh installed to protect the wearer from the Zone's dangerous, background psionic emanations...

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+20%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+20%
%c[255,1,255,255]Bullet-proof: %c[255,1,255,1]+23%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electroshock: %c[255,1,255,1]+15%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Bleeding: %c[255,1,255,1]-20%
%c[default]A Berill-5M Armored Suit whose fabric is saturated with a streptozoidal lotion, thus speeding up the healing of wounds significantly... the Berill Armor is a particularly durable suit, and is reasonably resistant to firearm damage. Drawbacks of this Armor, are its below-average anomaly protection and the weight of the suit in general. It comes equipped with first-generation Night-Vision...
Military SKAT-9M Armor PNV 'Cats Eye' MOD-2
Military SKAT-9M Armor PNV 'White Night' MOD-2

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+35%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+35%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+30%
%c[255,1,255,255]Bullet-proof: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+30%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electroshock: %c[255,1,255,1]+30%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]+30%
%c[default]The SKAT-9M is a heavy armored suit used by the Ukrainian Military and Stalkers doing Military contract work. It is composed of a PSZ-12p Vest, a built-in anomaly compensation unit, and a Sphere-12 helmet. This armor has quickly become the Military's equivalent to the Exoskeleton, as it offers similar protection without the extra weight... Durability, and above-average Anomaly protection make this suit a favorite among both Military professionals, and Stalkers alike...
Military SKAT-10 Armor PNV 'Cats Eye' MOD-3
Military SKAT-10 Armor PNV 'White Night' MOD-3

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+40%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+40%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+35%
%c[255,1,255,255]Bullet-proof: %c[255,1,255,1]+35%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+40%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+30%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electroshock: %c[255,1,255,1]+40%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]+35%
%c[255,1,255,255]Telepathy: %c[255,1,255,1]20
%c[default]Based on the SKAT-9M Heavy Armor, the SKAT-10 improves mobility by using more lightweight, and better protection materials. Ideally suited for carrying out assault operations within areas containing large numbers of Anomalies... It is composed of a PSZ-12 MOD-3 Vest, a built-in anomaly compensation unit, and a specially reinforced Sphere-12 mk.2 helmet...

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+30%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+30%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Bullet-proof: %c[255,1,255,1]+60%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+20%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electroshock: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]+15%
%c[255,1,255,255]Load-carrying capacity: %c[255,1,255,1]+5kg
%c[default]A first-generation Military Exoskeleton Prototype. It never went into full-scale production because of extremely high manufacturing costs. There were also some various, albeit minor design flaws to be found. Offers good, basic protection against the various dangers throughout the Zone...

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+45%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+40%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+40%
%c[255,1,255,255]Bullet-proof: %c[255,1,255,1]+30%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electroshock: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]+15%
%c[255,1,255,255]Load-carrying capacity: %c[255,1,255,1]+20kg
%c[default]Exoskeleton Armor makes use of electrically motivated muscle fibre bundles, and powerful servo-motors to provide the wearer with superior strength, and environmental protection. It is composed of two separate pieces of equipment: the Morph Radiation Suit, developed by RPS Industries Inc., which boasts heavy kevlar plates surrounding a tight fitting body-suit, which encompasses the entire body like a second skin, alongside composite armor plates [which can be upgraded to titanium plates]. In addition, these Radsuits also come with specially made Tactical helmets and Gas-Masks... A major benefit of the Exoskeleton is a significant increase in physical strength, allowing for greater carrying capacity...

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+45%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+40%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+40%
%c[255,1,255,255]Bullet-proof: %c[255,1,255,1]+30%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electroshock: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]+15%
%c[255,1,255,255]Load-carrying capacity: %c[255,1,255,1]+20kg
%c[default]Originally belonging to a Stalker known as 'Fang', a key member of Strelok's group. A Military Exoskeleton Prototype, it never actually went into serial production because of the extreme cost, alongside some minor design flaws... However; it seems that some are being produced in small batches out of illegal factories outside of the Zone. This is a third generation Exoskeleton. The design defects which used to decrease its mobility have all but been eliminated, and the Armor has been largely reinforced. It provides excellent bullet and shrapnel protection, and has very good protectyion characteristrics against radiation, and other anomalies...

It is composed of two separate pieces of equipment: the Morph Radiation Suit, developed by RPS Industries Inc., which boasts heavy kevlar plates surrounding a tight fitting body-suit, which encompasses the entire body like a second skin, alongside composite armor plates [which have been upgraded to titanium plates]. %c[default]Stalker Suit manufactured by 'Folk Craftsmen". It is an effective combination of a light military bullet-proof vest and of a rubberized fabric suit. It is reinforced with inserted kevlar plates and provides good protection from weak gunfire. The former owner of this thing was a real 'tourist' in every sense of the word, and often went on very difficult excursions into the Zone. He knew how to correctly distribute the weight of his load, and made his own modifications to the suit in order to accomodate that... as a result, this unique Stalker Suit has an increased carrying capacity of +10kg...

%c[default]The SEVA Suit is a CBRN (Chemical, Biological, Radiological, Nuclear) Protective Suit developed by MIR-12, a clandestine organization that arrived in the Zone shortly after the the second 'incident' in 2006 that nobody seems to know much about, or at least no-one is talking... The SEVA suit represents the pinnacle of personal protection technology available in the Zone, combining a lightweight Bullet-Proof vest, a closed cycle breathing system, and an integrated Anomalous Field Suppression Unit [AFSU]...

%c[default]Manufactured by the Gunsmith's of the Freedom Faction, making use of electrically motivated muscle fibre bundles, and powerful servo-motors to provide the wearer with superior strength, and environmental protection. It is composed of two separate pieces of equipment: the Morph Radiation Suit, developed by RPS Industries Inc., which boasts heavy kevlar plates surrounding a tight fitting body-suit, which encompasses the entire body like a second skin, alongside composite armor plates [which can be upgraded to titanium plates]. In addition, these Radsuits also come with specially made Tactical helmets and Gas-Masks... A major benefit of the Exoskeleton is a significant increase in physical strength, allowing for a +25kg carrying capacity...

%c[default]The latest development from the Gunsmith's of the Freedom Faction, making use of electrically motivated muscle fibre bundles, and powerful servo-motors to provide the wearer with superior strength, and environmental protection. It is composed of two separate pieces of equipment: the Morph Radiation Suit, developed by RPS Industries Inc., which boasts heavy kevlar plates surrounding a tight fitting body-suit, which encompasses the entire body like a second skin, alongside composite armor plates [which can be upgraded to titanium plates]. In addition, these Radsuits also come with specially made Tactical helmets and Gas-Masks... A major benefit of the Exoskeleton is a significant increase in physical strength, allowing for a +40kg carrying capacity...

%c[default]Armor modified by means of an antigravitational artefact known as 'Cobblestone"... A bullet-proof vest allowing for extended carrying capacity, thus making it heavier overall. Unfortunately, because of its upgrades, vulnerabilities to physical attacks have become apparent...

%c[default]This basic outfit consists of a jacket with a sky-blue/white camouflage pattern with a hood drawn over the head, a black cowl, a tactical vest, gray pants, kneepads and hiking boots. It was designed for conducting search operations in areas of low anomalous activity. Its higher quality materials result in greater durability. Includes a container capable of holding artefacts... It is used typically by Clear Sky scouts and command.

%c[default]Manufactured by skilled Craftsman of the 'Clear Sky' Faction, The CS-1 Body Armor consists of a tactical vest with medium grade military kevlar... Carrying pouches and a tactical helmet with a gas mask and large goggles, carried over a sky blue/white camouflage shirt and dark pants with metal kneepads, and hiking boots. Heavier, kevlar-padded panels are added to the arms and legs to increase the Suit's protective performance... Provides good protection against various anomalies and radiation...

%c[default]The CS SSP-99 suit has an integrated air-filtering and air-conditioning system with the main body of the suit made out of materials that are resistant to both heat and electricity, providing near-invulnerability to the Zone's radiation, and anomalous activity. For additional protection, the suit is treated with a special substance obtained from 'Urchin' artefacts. It also includes second generation Night-Vision capabilities. Since this suit was designed primarily to protect the wearer from hazardous and toxic elements, it has very poor protection against firearms and explosives...

%c[255,1,255,255]Telepathy: %c[255,1,255,1]+100%\n%c[default]Psychiatrist's Overcoat - a typical Bandit Trenchcoat, only white in colour - very similar to a Medical Coat. Does not offer any protection whatsoever against bullets or shrapnel... Possesses one remarkable property: the capability to entirely negate a Controller's Psi-influence [-100%]... The mask is attached to the Overcoat with a ceramic-based centrifuge, and the built-in Night Vision cannot be upgraded. It is not known who developed this amazing garment, but some have mentioned the possibility of the Dharma Initiative being involved somehow...

%c[default]Suit used by Monolith Faction Scientists. Developed in a Secret Lab deep inside the Zone, This suit comprises a closed-cycle breathing module and an integrated anomalous field suppression system. Anomaly and radiation protection is far superior to that of the SSP-99 suit, making the two unmatched in those terms. Superb Night Vision is required because of the dark conditions these Suits are used in... very rare... in fact, no-one really believes they actually exist... until now...

%c[default]This Suit has come by its name honestly - It was handcrafted by a Stalker who used to be a Moscow Fireman. Basically, it is a Scientific Suit in which the glass from the helmet and its 'lining' have been completely replaced with heat resistant counterparts... It has also become a much heavier Suit to wear because of the Asbestos lining that was used in order to make it 100% flame resistant. Possesses reasonable protection against chemical agents... As the Suit deteriorates, its protective characteristics decrease... It is equipped with built in, high quality Night Vision...

%c[default]It is not known how this Suit fell into the hands of Tirex. We do know, however; that this Armor was modified by Tirex, and then was sold to 'Shaku'. He immediately started them into circulation throughout the Zone... A fairly unremarkable Suit with low protective characteristics [still higher than that of a non-upgraded Suit]... The main distinguishing feature being its storage capabilities in that it allows for significantly more weight to be carried than other similar models... even most Exoskeletons. 'Tirex' was a Stalker who travelled deep into the Zone, as this suit was designed primarily to carry lots of swag back into safer areas where they could be sold, or traded...

c[default]This bulletproof Military Suit is designed for assault operations in areas of anomalous activity. It includes a PSZ-12p heavy military bulletproof suit, an integrated compensation suit and a Sphere-12M helmet. It provides perfect protection from bullets and shrapnel, and it doesn't decrease the soldier's mobility. It has a balanced system of anomaly protection...

c[default]A SSP-99 chemical protection suit specially designed for the Zone conditions. It is used by scientific expeditions and the eco-stalkers who cooperate with them. It has an integrated air-filtering and air-conditioning system. It is heat and electricity resistant, provides good protection from radiation and biological anomalies. It is resistans to chemically aggressive environments. It is not designed for combat, so it provides neither bullet, nor splinter protection. A built in container for carrying Artefacts is included...

%c[default]This one of the two Ukrainian Nano costume was created by the scientists in secret laboratories for the only one purpose - deep ZONE investigations!. Most importantly, this Nanosuit is not wear out, which is carried out on the level of the light-absorbing high-molecular material, with which he absorbs light and uses this energy for charging NANO particles. When it comes to damage, NANO particles automatically restore damaged places on suit, as well NANO particles give the wearer strength to carry the burden to 250kg. They are spreading rumors, that the only Sakharov have and sell some special upgrades for this suit, but the others mechanics in area have only ability to repair this sort of suits...
